text:
The Bregenz District is a district in Vorarlberg, Austria. It has an area of 863.37 km². As of 2012, 130,425 people lived there. The administrative center of the district is Bregenz.
Geography.
It is in the Bregenz Forest region, the Leiblach valley, and the Austrian part of Lake Constance.
Places.
The district has 40 municipalities, one of them is a town, and four are market towns.
